name: Melkat
description:
Did you ever wonder where your cat come from?

... I mean where he REALLY come from?

Melkat is the story of him/her and his fight for the long and hard road to your home.
You and your friend have to survive the galactic dangers of a collapsing universe, jumping from planet to planet until the best of three rounds gets to the single sit rocket and fly to earth to prosper as your domestic cat.

Made by @tremor_al (programming), @melkar (models and animations) and @fela (SFX that could't get in, music, and illustrations).
